credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's card notes that she purchased all five samplers from Matilda Jane Goddard in 1916 through someone in Farmington, Conn.
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
description:
A verse and inscription at the center are surrounded by scattered trees, flowering trees, birds and rabbits. With a narrow strawberry vine border. The verse reads:
I would like Enoch walk with God
In Fellowship divine
And tread the pilgrim's lowly road
And in his image shine
name: Sampler
